name: Cosmic Star
description:
There is a glitch were the explosion is broken when you die, I'll fix it and add updates after the jam is over.

Story:

Kill bugs because it's your mission for some reason. Get the "U orbs" because they give you UPGRADES and that's cool.

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Pause - ESC

Shoot - Enter or Space

// The game has controller support //
